full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG CHEN GSO SBYONG JI LTAR BSRUNG TSUL SOGS GSAL BAR BKOD PA SDOM BRTZON RNA RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,CES THEG CHEN GSO SBYONG JI LTAR BSRUNG TSUL SOGS GSAL BAR BKOD PA SDOM BRTZON RNA RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, TSUL 'DI LA MOS SHING RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BA'I NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, ,MANG THOS RIGS SMRA'I GZUGS BRNYAN ^SPRANG BTZUN NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RANG GZHAN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGALAm, ,
